MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L4  postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Westminster Road, Brunswick Close and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers on site confirmed an underground cable fault outside 11 Humber Crescent.  Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.55pm on Jan 20, 2021.
